title: Makkrom Men Linen Shirt Button Down Long Sleeve Cotton Beach Band Collar Casual Summer Shirts
description: Material: 70% Cotton + 30% Linen. Ultra soft, stretch, comfortable and breathable fabric.
Features: Cotton linen button down shirts, regular fit sewn collar long sleeve shirt, solid color banded collar shirt make your summer cooler.
Occasion: Perfect for beach vacation, wedding, yoga, party, work and casual cruise wear. Perfect for all seasons and occasions, especially on hot summer days.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold setting keeps colors vibrant and ensures long-lasting durability, do not bleach and iron.
Warm Tips: Please read the size information of the product description before ordering in order to choose your own size.
